ingredients: 2  very ripe bananas, 1 cup milk, 6  ice cubes, 1   +   1/2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 tablespoon peanut butter, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 9%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 10mg 3%, Sodium 92mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 13%, Dietary Fiber 5g 18%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 11mg 53%, Calcium 159mg 12%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 724mg 15%
